name: Enna My Beloved
description:
Enna Alouette【NIJISANJI EN】 fangame

You play as Enna Alouette from Nijisanji EN's 3rd Wave Ethyria, trapped in an unknown and generally dark area infested with what seemed to be distorted versions of herself who are out to knock her out and take her away. By any means necessary, fight your way through the other Ennas and find a way out of the compound in this really short game.

I made this game after playing some simple RPG Maker games and thought to myself, "I can do that too". 

I can't.

It was just supposed to be a shitpost maze game for Enna's return but I had too much fun with it, the scope got too big, and eventually I got bored with it so you can tell that the game is unfinished. So rather than just dropping the entire thing, I'm publishing it as is.

Did I playtest it? Yes

Update: Uploaded the wrong file, the game can be cleared now.

It's a shitpost gone extremely wrong.
